tooltip_tab_transcription: Configure the main transcription service (API, model, language, etc.).
tooltip_tab_rephrase: Set up automatic rephrasing or prompting of your transcribed text using a secondary AI model.
tooltip_tab_transformations: Define custom prompts for manual selection-based rephrasing / transformations.
tooltip_tab_general: General application settings like UI language, logging options, etc.
rephrase_enable_tooltip:
If enabled, the transcribed text can be automatically sent to another AI model
for rephrasing or to follow instructions (LivePrompting). 

This adds latency and API-cost, hence you can configure trigger words to only rephrase
when you explicitly use them in the transcription. This way you can even LivePrompt, i.e.
make your Transcription contain a prompt which will be executed by the AI.
rephrase_trigger_tooltip:
Enter one or more words separated by a comma.
Leave empty to rephrase always if enabled.
rephrase_context_checkbox: Add selected text as Context when LivePrompting via Triggerword
rephrase_context_tooltip:
If checked, any text you have selected on screen will be automatically added
as context to the prompt when a trigger word is used.
rephrase_prompt_placeholder: e.g. Rephrase the text more politely...
transformations_info: Define up to {max_entries} rewording Prompts for Post-Processing of Transcriptions.
debug_logging_checkbox: Activate Debug Logging (more details in log)
file_logging_checkbox: Write log file in application folder (voice_transcriber.log)
play_last_recording_tooltip: Play latest recording using the default system player
transcription_failed_message: Transcription failed. See dialog for details.
validation_warning_text: There seem to be some issues with your settings (warnings only / still saved):
quit_dialog_text: Are you sure you want to exit?
